message.entry: Typecast a floating-point type to an unsigned integer, or vice versa. This block accepts half, single, double, uint16, uint32, or uint64 data type on the input. The output will be the underlying bits of the input casted to a fixed-point or floating-point representation.

Return a consecutive field of bits from the input signal. The field is indexed (0-based relative to LSB) by the LSB Position and MSB Position. This block accepts integer, boolean and fixed-point data type on the input. The output will be the sliced bits of the input casted to a fixed-point or unsigned integer representation.
